segments.text: Excuse me . Where is Q-Duck ? I remember it was around the second intersection of this street .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Q-Duck ? Do you mean the famous roast-duck store ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They have moved to some other places long time ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , this place is quite different from ten years ago when I first came to China .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , a lot of changes have happened here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This street used to have few stores . But now , you can see supermarkets , shopping malls and department stores everywhere .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , they are my wife's heaven , but not mine . I always get lost in the supermarket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too ! I was lost three times ten years ago . There were no English directions then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , there are many English signs , and wrong spellings as many as them .
segments.speaker: S1
